mapper.select: SELECT cm.seq ,cm.category ,mm.id as writer ,cm.title ,cm.contents ,cm.createDate ,cm.modiDate ,cm.viewCount FROM community cm JOIN member mm ON mm.seq = cm.writer
SELECT cm.seq ,cm.category ,mm.id as writer ,cm.title ,cm.contents ,cm.createDate ,cm.modiDate ,cm.viewCount FROM community cm JOIN member mm ON mm.seq = cm.writer WHERE 1=1 AND cm.writer = #{writer}
SELECT cm.category ,mm.id as writer ,cm.title ,cm.contents ,cm.createDate ,cm.viewCount From community cm JOIN member mm ON mm.seq = cm.writer WHERE 1=1 AND cm.seq=#{shSeq}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community WHERE 1=1 AND category = #{i}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM community WHERE 1=1 AND category = #{category} AND createDate LIKE CONCAT ('%',#{createDate},'%')
SELECT seq FROM community ORDER BY seq DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT seq ,type ,defaultNY ,sort ,originalName ,uuidName ,ext ,size ,delNY ,pSeq ,path FROM uploadedCommunity WHERE 1=1 AND pSeq = #{pSeq}
